title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Dr. <!--more--> Paul Craig Roberts and he is one of today’s more progressive analytical writers and commentators on the state of the nation: governmental dysfunction, political corruption, global and domestic economic threats and decay, our wars on terror and our Middle East conflicts, 911, and the decline in human values in American society.
He was an Assistant Secretary of Treasury during Ronald Reagan’s first term, and is a former editor and columnist for the Wall Street Journal.
